title: Smart Data models - Unmanned Aerial Vehicle schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a specific Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV). This entity is primarily associated with UAV command and control and related UAV transport applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity identifier. It has to be UnmannedAerialVehicle

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

UnmannedAerialVehicleModel.description: Relationship. Reference to the UAV Model definition which describes the UAV in more detail.

operator.description: Relationship. A list detailing the operator or operators of the UAV. Refers to one or more Schema.org person or organization.https://schema.org/Personhttps://schema.org/Organization

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

operationMode.description: Property. Text describing the choice from these values. Enum:'vlos, evlos, bvlos, automated'. Note: descriptions align with UTM Flight message.

elevation.description: Property. The elevation of the UAV (relative to ground level at the specified location). Specify value and units of measure.

flightStatus.description: Property. The flight status of the UAV, including these. Enum:'stop, takeoff, flight, hover, land'

workStatus.description: Property. The work status of the UAV, including these. Enum:'stop, prepare, work, finish'

groundSpeed.description: Property. The latest reported ground speed of the UAV. Specify value and units of measure

fuel.description: Property. Current fuel load of the UAV. Specify value and units of measure

observedAt.description: Property. Indicates the date/time of the latest monitoring report or update.
